about_the_game:
Summary:

Embark on a relentless challenge in Trap Tower Trials as a mysterious mage. Face the ultimate test of patience and skill in a tower that offers no respite, only a relentless barrage of obstacles and traps. This game is a linear gauntlet, meticulously designed to push you to your limits. Your mission: ascend the unforgiving heights of this daunting structure, mastering each level with precision and determination. Are you ready to prove your mettle in the face of this relentless test?

Environment:

Navigate through increasingly challenging levels, each floor presenting its own unique set of traps and hazards. From ice-encased corridors that chill to the bone to magic-infused chambers that dazzle and deceive, vigilance is your greatest ally. Be ever mindful of the dangers that lurk around every corner.

Progress:

Life's little interruptions won't cost you your progress. Whether it's a call to dinner from your mother or a plea from your partner to take a break, you can resume your ascent right where you left off. The tower waits for no one, but it will hold your place.

Competition:

In the end, it's not just about conquering the tower—it's about claiming bragging rights. Compare your achievements and times with friends to determine who truly is the master of the tower. Will you stand victorious above the rest?

name: Trap Tower Trials

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 | Intel Core i5-6600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 | Intel Core i5-7600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 | AMD Radeon 5700 XT
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Trap Tower Trials is a 3D single-player platformer that will test your dexterity with various traps and obstacles. This game is designed to be a challenge; therefore, we are not responsible for any peripherals broken in anger. Do you think you'll be able to climb the tower?
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
